评论概述: Nice shoe but don’t risk an exchange!!!!
评论详情: Shoe was great, but it was too big for my husband so we returned it and requested an exchange for a smaller size. That request went in a week or so before Christmas and now it’s saying we might not get the replacement until MARCH. When I go on the same shoe order page, I could literally order the size we need and get it tomorrow, but it’s more expensive now than when I bought it so I don’t want to cancel the exchange unless I know for sure we aren’t getting the replacement. Not sure how there is a delay when the shoe is available, so if you’re not 100% confident in your size, it might not be worth the order if you end up unlucky like me.

New Balance uses *E for wide sizing.  For example, I always buy size 12 4E.  Amazon has them listed as Wide, X-Wide, and XX-Wide.  So I ordered XX-Wide.  Turns out that is 6E, as it says on the box and on the shoes.  So I had to send them back and get X-Wide, which is 4E.  Amazon should use the sizes the manufacturer uses.Update 1/15/24 - After returning the XX-Wide/6E for the correct X-Wide/4E, they are a perfect fit, as usual.  I have been buying the 600-series in 4E for years, and they still feel great right out of the box.

Normally shoes running large is a good thing for me because I have slightly wide feet but, seeing so many wide options, I chose my size in wide. I didn't know new balances ran normal to large and had I known I would've just purchased my size in regular. As it is, the toe box in these is both too wide and to long. I've gotta return these and I'm going to try other new balances on at a store to see what's up. If you have only slightly wide feet and sometimes have a hard time choosing between a wide option and a regular option, definitely go for the regular
I have been wearing 608 s for many years and this black pair is very poor quality. Not nearly as good as the brown ones. Think they are not truly new balance. Knockoffs.

I have a 12 narrow size foot. I recently purchased a pair of New Balance shoes and had to return them and order a half size bigger. They fit good. So, I repeated that with these shoes and hit right on the mark. These are roomy in width as I am a narrow. But they are not too wide. I put a pair of Good Feet in them and I was glad the foot insert was removable. These shoes, like the last pair I ordered, taper fast to a pointy toe box. That's why I had to go up in size, I am glad I did. I just put .85 of a mile on the treadmill going 3.4 mph and a 6 on the incline. They fit the bill perfectly, thank goodness! I rushed to get these as the last pair i purchased, doubled in price, and that was recently.

These are very comfortable with plenty of room for wide feet.  The soles are very firm and will require some breaking in.  Unlike my Hokas, they do not have a lot of soft foam interspersed with the harder sole material.  This makes them less flexible but also avoids picking up thorns, twigs and other debris in the soft areas.  They have good lateral support which is welcome on the trail.  The main body of the shoe is leather which, unlike fabric bodies, restricts the dissipation of moisture.  Overall, I am very pleased.
These tennis shoes are comfortable and look good, too.  After wearing white New Balance shoes for years, I thought I would try another color from the same brand.

The New Balance Men's 608 V5 Casual Comfort Cross Trainers offer excellent comfort and support. The cushioning is great for all-day wear, and the breathable upper keeps your feet cool even during extended use. The fit is true to size, and the shoe provides good arch support, which is important for both workouts and casual wear.  The design is simple yet stylish, and they’re versatile enough to wear with different outfits. Whether you’re using them for light training, walking, or everyday activities, these trainers do the job well. I highly recommend them for anyone looking for a comfortable, supportive shoe for a variety of uses.

评论概述: Not my favorite NB training shoe
评论详情: Compared to 2 other NB trainer models, both with significantly higher price, I'm not a fan of these 608's. I find that they offer mediocre lateral stability and support and the shoelace hole/eyelet design is flawed. 2 pairs of eyelets in the middle of the eyelet stack are made of cloth. So rather than the lace going through leather (like usual) on these two pairs of eyelets they go through a non leather material. This material stretches' faster and more then the leather eyelets and creates an imbalance in the support  to your foot. Too much pressure is provided to one spot of the foot rather then spread out evenly across the entire shoe...For the price nice pair of casual walkers, but for more demanding activities I'd look at a more expensive ND trainer.

评论概述: Not durable, expect to replace often
